full_summary:
#  Forklift Truck Tender Notice

**Tender Identification**

*   Solicitation Number: WS4282678757
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Publication Date: February 22, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date and Time: March 21, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
*   Amendment Date: March 1, 2024

**Tender Description**

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is seeking to purchase the following forklift trucks and accompanying items:

*   One (1) Group 2A Configuration F forklift truck
*   One (1) Group 4B Configuration B forklift truck
*   Ancillary items
*   Integrated Logistic Support items
*   Familiarization and Troubleshooting trainings

**Notice Type**

This is a competitive tender, using a traditional procurement method. The lowest price will be the selection criterion.

**Special Instructions**

*   The closing time for bid submission has been extended to March 21, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT.
*   Late bids will not be accepted.
*   Interested bidders must be pre-qualified for a Supply Arrangement (SA) prior to submitting a bid.
*   For more information on the SA process, please refer to the following link: Request for Supply Arrangements for Loaders.

**Contact Information**

*   Contracting Authority: Pieris, Sherline (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: [sherline.pieris@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sherline.pieris@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Phone(Number): N/A
*   Fax: N/A

**Delivery Location**

The forklift trucks will be delivered to the following location:

*   Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
*   200 Kent Street
*   Ottawa, Ontario
*   K1A 0E6
*   Canada

**Language of the Tender Notice**

English and French

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
